Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyChangeListener, EventListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
NewGameController, RestoredGameController
public abstract class Controller extends Object implements PropertyChangeListener
The abstract class Controller manages all actions performed on a game by the clients and creates the game related messages that will be sent to them

      public abstract void addPlayer(String nickname)
      The addPlayer method adds a player with the given nickname to the game managed by this controller
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player to add

    • messageOnGame

      public Message messageOnGame(String nickname, GameMessage message)
      The messageOnGame method performs the action represented by tho given message on the game managed by this controller
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player that performs the move
      message - the GameMessage that represent the move performed
      Returns:
      the answer to be sent to the client bound to the player that performed the move

    • clientDisconnected

      public void clientDisconnected(String nickname)
      The method clientDisconnected handles the disconnection of a client bound to this controller by informing all the other players and saving the game unless the game is finished or is not started yet
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player whose client disconnected

    • propertyChange

      public void propertyChange(PropertyChangeEvent evt)
      The method propertyChange is called after the method fire is executed from a class to which the controller is listening to. If the property name is "playerModified" the controller will send the updated Player (data?) to all of the players in the game.
      Specified by:
      propertyChange in interface PropertyChangeListener
      Parameters:
      evt - is the PropertyChangeEvent that describes the object that has been modified
